summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 15 November to end of Wednesday 17 November GMT
description: Cooler than of late. Mainly dry with sunny spells but outbreaks of drizzle possible and a moderate breeze.<br/><br/>Back-trajectories show air arriving having travelled from the Atlantic therefore very little import is expected from this path. <br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
